dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S193 IS: Neighbors Not Enemies Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Hirono (for herself, Mr. Booker, Ms. Duckworth, Mr. Durbin, Mr. Markey, Mr. Sanders, and Ms. Warren) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To repeal the Alien Enemies Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Neighbors Not Enemies Act.
Sections 4067 through 4070 of the Revised Statutes of the United States (50 U.S.C. 21â€“24) are repealed.
